class.name: cooperative_manipulation_controllers/FrankaJointImpedanceController
class.description: A controller that tracks a velocity with a joint impedance controller that compensates coriolis torques. The torque commands are compared to measured torques in Console outputs.

class.name: cooperative_manipulation_controllers/FrankaCartesianImpedanceController
class.description: A controller that tracks a velocity with a cartesian impedance controller that compensates coriolis torques. The torque commands are compared to measured torques in Console outputs.
